value.description: The value (on the gauge) that this indicator should be placed at

type.description:
The type of indicator to draw.  Varies by gauge type.  Some examples include
"line", "arrow", and "bar"

label.description: The text label for the indicator.

length.description:
The length of the indicator.  In the above example, the radius of the AnalogGauge
is 125, but the length of the indicator is 135, meaning it would project beyond
the edge of the AnalogGauge

hover.description: The string to put in the tooltip when this indicator is hovered over.

front.description: Keep this indicator at the front

easing.description: indicates the easing function to be used when animating the of an indicator.

duration.description: indicates how long an animation of the indicator should take

noChange.description:
indicates whether the indicator's value can be changed.  Useful for
a static target indicator.  Default is false (that the value can be changed).

title.value: An indicator for the BarGauge that draws a segment a line corresponding to the indicator value.
